file_insights.primary_function: Fetch all projects with metadata and Git information

patterns_discovered: Next.js API route with typed response
Sorting of results by last modified date
gotchas_discovered: Handles scenarios where project scans might partially or completely fail
Provides fallback error responses with detailed error codes
Enriches basic project scan with additional Git metadata
recommendations: Consider adding pagination for large project directories
Implement caching mechanism to reduce repeated scanning
Add logging for scan errors and performance tracking
Create unit tests for different scanning scenarios
